exec: //  Verify the condition if code === 200 and size is NOT equal 0
//  Set envrionment variable for upgrade package ID if code === 200
//  Run assertions when code === 200 and size is NOT zero
tests["Verify the title of package"] = data.content[0].title === "EMC eCDM - Major Release";
tests["Verify Package Description"] = data.content[0].description === "This package will upgrade all the skyline components";

      "visible": true,
      "forwarded": false

exec: tests["Verify published notification is unacknowledged by default"] = data.content[0].ack.ackState === "UNACK";
tests["Verify the severity of notification"] = data.content[0].severity === "NOTIFICATION";
tests["Verify the category of notification"] = data.content[0].category === "MONITORING";

request.url: https://{{ip}}:8443/api/v1/events?filter=properties.component eq"TelMgr" and catalogCode eq "TLM" and summary eq"An upgrade package of version: ecdm-upgrade-2.0.0-5-SNAPSHOT.pkg is available to download from the upgrades tab."
